Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Game class is the main class of the game. This class runs the actual Battleship game taking into consideration the game logic.
Author:
kelvin.likollari@usi.ch| and ilker.kaymak@usi.ch

    • updateGameDisplay

      public static void updateGameDisplay(Field field1, Field field2)
      THe following method updates the display of the game. It is going to update the display of the player's field, and the display of the AI's field.
      Parameters:
      field1 - is the player's field
      field2 - is the AI's field

      Parameters:

      field2 - is the second player's field

    • getSecondAiShipSymbol

      public static void getSecondAiShipSymbol(String symbol)
      Get symbol of the second AI player. In this case, the second AI player is the one that is going to replace the player that was doing the move first.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol of the second AI player.

    • shoot

      public boolean shoot(int x1, int y1)
      The following method is used to shoot. It checks if the shot is valid with respect to the board coordinates. If the shot is valid, it checks if the shot is a hit or a miss. This method is used in the TUI.
      Parameters:
      x1 - the x coordinate of the shot.
      y1 - the y coordinate of the shot.
      Returns:
      true if the shot is a hit, false if the shot is a miss.
